1518860.name: Gravel Gang
1518860.description:
Gravel Gang is a simple but challenging real-time strategy/tactic casual game.

Make smart plans and show your strategic skills, fight and conquer the challenging maps to WIN!

You will be richly rewarded for victories, you can buy epic heroes and prove your skills with them.

Download it and experience for yourself!

ONLINE MULTIPLAYER
Online multiplayer is one of the most exciting features of Gravel Gang, allowing you to test your skills against other players from around the world. You can join matches with random opponents and battle it out on the same challenging maps featured in the single-player mode.

EVERY MAP IS A NEW CHALLENGE
Maps with 3 to 6 players and some with holes in the middle. Each opponent starts from a corner and tries to conquer the map. Last team standing is the winner, try to survive, invade areas, fight enemies in big gang-wars and show your strategic-thinking-skills.

NEW HEROES TO UNLOCK
Earn coins and unlock new heroes. From humans to witches and zombies, it's all there.
Each hero comes in 6 different colors and you can unlock them all at once!

PLAYABLE OFFLINE
3 different bot difficulty levels, with which there is a certain challenge for everyone, more difficult maps offer much more reward. Even without an Internet connection, fun is guaranteed, because the game is also playable offline.

FREE GAME
Play this game without spending money, we provide you with free updates and new content constantly. Earn a lot of coins from wins in different Maps, collect the rewards from achievements and buy great heroes with them.

ACHIEVEMENTS
With great rewards to claim, one can now start unlocking and collecting achievements. The rewards bring with them new goals to achieve, while having fun in the challenging maps.

If you prefer playing with friends, Gravel Gang also offers the option to create private lobbies. Invite your friends to join, and you can compete against each other in intense gang-wars, each trying to be the last team standing.

Whether you're playing against strangers or friends, the online multiplayer mode in Gravel Gang is sure to keep you engaged and challenged for hours on end. So why wait? Download the game now and start battling it out online!


Game created by 'InArt Games' - stay tuned for new epic content!

英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
